text: I wasn’t blown away by my experience but I also wasn’t upset. The RealReal is an online resale store and that is how I would describe my experience

author: Rosalie
text:
The sunglasses i purchased were ok. I didn’t see anyplace where it said they had a scratch on them. Giving you the benefit of the doubt!
I wouldn’t purchase from you again 
Thank you
title: The sunglasses i purchased were scratched

i lost a package im still waiting the refund

author: customer Gregory King
text:
I like to start with my first visit To your store in Chicago on Michigan Avenue I walked in the store ask about it iPad case ,the young man that was so call helping me. Act like a just walked into his house uninvited 😳, I stated to him what I was look for he had a computer in his hand and me for the invoice number 🤔 so is his computer for show or does it work. He told me to order it on line and if I don’t like the case I can return it .
I don’t buy products to return it when I buy something because I want it, so A couple of months later I decided to order it online because the price had went down. When I made my order your Co sent a address change to one of my referral 😳😳😳😡 so I received a message stated my package would be delivered on Friday April 29, at 7 pm ok , I was waiting and waiting until 8:30pm NO PACKAGE so I text the Co and got a text back stating my package will be delivered on Monday, May 2 and what do you know five minutes later my package was delivered to my door. THANKS
title: I like to start with my first visit To… for a mini iPad case Zegna

author: Dawn  Wheeler
text: I was sent an arm wristlet not a wristlet it was listed wrong and sold with Chinese tags very dissatisfied I want my money back to my charge card asap
title: I was sent an arm wristlet not a…

author: customer
text: The pair of shoes I received are two different sizes. This was not clearly represented in the listing. They were a good price, but that’s a significant detail!
title: The pair of shoes I received are two…

author: customer
text: The product was great, but I did not expect to pay extra $41 for UPS since it said shipping in the amount I paid so I won't be using TheRealReal anymore😔
title: Extra shipping price

author: Austin Grantham
text: Item not as described, over a week after delivery and at least 5 emails and still haven’t gotten anything but an automated response from their “customer service”. Save yourself the headache
title: Item not as described

author: customer
text: Not only was the order incorrect but I paid 1 to 2 day shipping and shipping ot it 4 days later... I contacted customer service and was called a liar called stupid ... at this point I  will NEVER buy from there again
title: Not only was the order incorrect but I…

author: customer
text: I did not know that one of the items was final sale based on my shopping experience - and it is not in as good condition as I expected based on the description.
title: I did not know that one of the items…

author: customer
text: Jeans have severe puckering thought your site would never accept items like this and listed them as very good with no mention of puckering in description. Am now noticing a lot of your listed jeans appear to have really bad puckering but it is not mentioned in the description.
title: Jeans have severe puckering thought…

author: Gina
text: I received a color died pair of shoes. Not authentic.  The shoes were brittle and not the original color. When I tried them on for the first time, I had blue die all over my toes.  I had to pay to ship them back.
title: I received a color died pair of shoes

author: customer
text: I’m not sure it’s real brand, looks like not real brand.  Can’t figure out it’s real brand or not!!
title: I’m not sure it’s real brand

author: Suzanne Kühl
text: I purchased an item that was supposed to be in "very good" condition but this was not case when I received my purse. The hardware had rust that was note noted and the faint marking on the strap was by no means faint. The item is unwearable but their no return policy left me without any options. Last time purchasing from this site.
title: Quality did not meet description
